verbose_text: In order to detect enhancement of SUMO-1 modification, a titration was performed to determine the SUMO-1 concentration at which modification of HTT was barely detectable (XREF_FIG) and the addition of a relevant E3 ligase could increase HTT SUMO modification.
evidence: SUMO-1 concentration at which modification of HTT was barely detectable ( XREF_FIG ) and the addition of a relevant E3 ligase could increase HTT
